body: is the code I just suggested good enough for a built-in method ? It worked perfectly with what I've been doing but I'm not good with regex stuff. does it cover all cases ?
@jonathansampson any suggestion ? do you like to contribute to Yii ? we would like a similar thing [here](https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2/blob/master/framework/web/Request.php#L521-L591).
or maybe it should be better based on a maintained list like [this one](https://publicsuffix.org/list/public_suffix_list.dat)  -- https://publicsuffix.org/

there is already a PHP implementation of it linked in the learn more section:
 https://github.com/jeremykendall/php-domain-parser
